bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description:
I'm getting a hard crash on 0.9.1 on the configuration below. Not sure yet if it's an invalid configuration not being detected, or simply an edge case bug. Process finished with exit code -1073740940 (0xC0000374) with no error log. <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/dionisole/4180216ca36f4131302a666b8daabd3b>https://gist.github.com/dionisole/4180216ca36f4131302a666b8daabd3b</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://files.gitter.im/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/tuninghelp/PpiH/protein_csv_test_all.txt>https://files.gitter.im/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/tuninghelp/PpiH/protein_csv_test_all.txt</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Looks quite possible. That bug was fixed on current master.
Confirmed - this runs fine on master. Closing this.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
